#summary How you can contribute to this project
#labels Featured,Phase-Support

= I can code! =
  * *Coding on libproxy*
    # Check out the [Roadmap TODO list]
    # Make a patch
    # Submit it for review

  * *Adding libproxy support to other applications*
    # Pick a [Applications project that needs to support libproxy]
    # Download the source code for that project
    # Make a patch for the project to support libproxy
    # File the patch on the pre-existing bug (see the PR section below)
    # Politely dialog with the project and advocate for adoption of your patch

= I can do PR! =
  # Pick a [Applications project that needs to support libproxy]
  # Fill in the various info in the [Applications application table]
  # File a bug against that project
  # Paste the URL to that bug into the [Applications application table]
  # Fill out the [ContactTemplate contact template] and email it to the project's mailing list
  # Politely dialog with the project and advocate for libproxy adoption

= I can write documentation! =
  # Look for holes in the current documentation
  # Edit the wiki
